list.title: Alt
list.description: Creates an instance of Alt.

list.title: AppendTo
list.description: Creates an instance of AppendTo.

list.title: AriaHidden
list.description: Creates an instance of AriaHidden.

list.title: ClassList
list.description: Creates an instance of ClassList.

list.title: Cols
list.description: Creates an instance of Cols.

list.title: DEBUG
list.description: A flag to enable or disable debug mode.

list.title: Data
list.description: Creates an instance of Data.

list.title: ElementEvent
list.description: Creates an instance of ElementEvent.

list.title: ElementEvents#appIframeMouseOut
list.description: Sets the iframeMouseOver property to false and clears the lastIframe reference.

list.title: ElementEvents#appIframeMouseOver
list.description:
Sets the `iframeMouseOver` property to true and updates the `lastIframe` property
with the target of the mouseover event.

list.title: ElementEvents#fileCreate
list.description: Creates a new file vNode by sending a request to the server and processing the response.

list.title: ElementEvents#fileDelete
list.description: Deletes a file based on the event triggered.

list.title: ElementEvents#fileModify
list.description: Modifies a vNode file based on the event triggered.

list.title: ElementEvents#folderCreate
list.description: Creates a new folder vNode in the desktop.

list.title: ElementEvents#navbarIconClick
list.description:
Handles the click event on a navbar icon by toggling the active state of the icon
and showing/hiding the corresponding app window.

list.title: Id
list.description: Creates an instance of Id.

list.title: Name
list.description: Creates an instance of Name.

list.title: ReadOnly
list.description: Creates an instance of ReadOnly.

list.title: SandBox
list.description: Creates an instance of SandBox.

list.title: Src
list.description: Creates an instance of Src.

list.title: TextContent
list.description: Creates an instance of TextContent.

list.title: Type
list.description: Creates an instance of Type.

list.title: addNotification
list.description: Adds a notification to the navbar with the specified content and options.

list.title: ajax
list.description: Performs an AJAX request to the server using the provided data.

list.title: appIframeLoaded
list.description:
Function to handle the event when the app iframe has finished loading.
It adds classes to the navbarHolder element to indicate that the iframe is running and active.

list.title: appOpen
list.description:
Opens an application window based on the provided node information.
Reads the vNode, creates the application window with its header, controls, and content,
and sets up the necessary event listeners and UI elements.

list.title: appResizeDown
list.description: Sets the appResizing status to true and assigns the current object as the second element in the status array.

list.title: appResizeUp
list.description: Set the appResizing status to false, indicating that the app is not resizing up.

list.title: appResizing.changeEvent
list.description:
Toggles the resizing state of the application window.
Sets up or removes the necessary event listeners and updates the application state.

list.title: appResizing.resizingEvent
list.description: Resizes the application window based on the mouse event and the grip direction.

list.title: appResizing.windowResize
list.description: Updates the maximum dimensions (maxX and maxY) based on the size of the free space for apps.

list.title: appendBefore
list.description: The function `appendBefore` inserts an element before a specified element in the DOM.

list.title: authSubmit
list.description:
Handles the form submission for login and registration forms.
Prevents the default form submission, processes the form based on its ID,
and plays an animation if the form is successfully handled.

list.title: bool
list.description: The function checks if the input value contains the string "true".

list.title: bubbleToClass
list.description: The function `bubbleToClass` used for retrieving closest parent containing given class from user event

list.title: bubbleToClassFromElement
list.description: The function `bubbleToClassFromElement` used for retrieving closest parent containing given class from user element

list.title: cl
list.description: The function `cl` logs the `arguments` to the console if the `DEBUG` variable is true.

list.title: closeAllDesktopContextMenus
list.description: The function `closeAllDesktopContextMenus` closes all desktop context menus

list.title: closeAllExplorerContextMenus
list.description: The function `closeAllExplorerContextMenus` closes all explorer context menus

list.title: closeApp
list.description: The function `closeApp` handle closing of the apps

list.title: closeDesktopCalendar
list.description: The function `closeDesktopCalendar` closes calendar

list.title: closeMainMenu
list.description: The function `closeMainMenu` closes main menu

list.title: closeScreenMenu
list.description: The function `closeScreenMenu` closes screen brightness menu

list.title: closeSearchbarMenu
list.description: The function `closeSearchbarMenu` closes search menu

list.title: countAllFiles
list.description: Updates the CSS variable with the total number of files.

list.title: countSelectedFiles
list.description: Updates the footer with the number and total size of selected files.

list.title: createElement
list.description: The function `createElement` handles elements creation

list.title: cssVar
list.description:
The `cssVar` function allows you to get or set the value of a CSS variable on the root element of
the document.

list.title: dbName
list.description: Constant for the name of the database.

list.title: dbShape
list.description: Creates an instance of dbShape.

list.title: dbStores
list.description: indexedDb structure structure

list.title: debounce
list.description: Debounces a callback function to limit the rate at which it is executed.

list.title: deleteDb
list.description: The function `deleteDb` deletes a database and resolves a promise once the operation is successful.

list.title: deselectAll
list.description: Deselects all files by removing the "selected" class from each file element.

list.title: deselectAllApps
list.description: The function `deselectAllApps` deselects all unwanted apps

list.title: deselectBasedOnClick
list.description:
Handles the click event based on the element clicked.
Closes various menus based on the clicked element.

list.title: deselectDesktopIcons
list.description: Deselects all desktop icons by removing the "icon-selected" class from each selected icon.

list.title: desktopIconContextMenu
list.description: Adds a context menu event listener to a desktop icon element.

list.title: desktopIconEditName
list.description: Allows the user to edit the name of a desktop icon by double-clicking on it.

list.title: desktopIconEditName~enterToSave
list.description: Function to handle the 'Enter' key press event to save the changes.

list.title: desktopIconEditName~focusOut
list.description: Function to handle the focus out event to save the changes.

list.title: desktopIconEditName~previousValue
list.description:
Event listener for double click event on an element. 
Closes all desktop context menus, adds event listener for keydown event to save changes,
selects text within the element, toggles the readOnly property of the element, and stops event propagation.

list.title: desktopIconEditName~stopEdit
list.description: Disables editing on the target element, deselects any text, and removes the event listener for saving on keydown.

list.title: desktopIconOpener
list.description:
Adds a double click event listener to the given element to open a context menu.
Retrieves data from local database based on the element's UUID and updates the timestamp.

list.title: desktopIconRename
list.description: Allows the user to rename a desktop icon by double-clicking on it.

list.title: desktopIconSelect
list.description: Adds click event listener to a desktop icon element for selection functionality.

list.title: desktopIconTooltip
list.description: The function `desktopIconTooltip` handles tooltip behavior

list.title: dragApp
list.description: The function `dragApp` handles app dragging

list.title: elementsCollide
list.description: Check if two elements on the page collide with each other.

list.title: fileRead
list.description: Asynchronously reads a vNode file with the given UUID.

list.title: fileSearchInputHandler
list.description:
Adds a context menu event listener to the desktop.
This creates a custom right-click menu for the desktop area.

list.title: getBattery
list.description: Retrieves battery information and updates the battery icon and tooltip accordingly.

list.title: getBluetooth
list.description: The function `getBluetooth` check if users computer or browser supports browser bluetooth api and if so, it creates navbar bluetooth access and click handler

list.title: getCookie
list.description: The function `getCookie` retrieves the value of a cookie by its name from the document's cookies.

list.title: getDestination
list.description: The function `getDestination` generates iframe url to load

list.title: getIcon
list.description: The function `getIcon` generates application icon URL adress

list.title: getIconTooltipText
list.description: The function `getIconTooltipText` generates desktop icon tooltip text used for showing user some basic file info

list.title: getLowestMaxAppZIndex
list.description: The function `getLowestMaxAppZIndex` get lowest unused z-index for displaying above others

list.title: getMethods
list.description: Retrieves all method names from an object, including inherited methods.

list.title: getParam
list.description: The function `getParam` retrieves a specific parameter value from the URL query string.

list.title: handleFileUpload
list.description: Handles the upload of files, checking if the file size exceeds the maximum allowed size. And run ajax calls for them separately

list.title: handleLogin
list.description:
Handles the login process.
Logs the login attempt and returns true to indicate successful handling.

list.title: handleRegister
list.description:
Handles the registration process.
Logs the registration attempt and checks if the passwords match.
Returns false if the passwords do not match, otherwise returns true.

list.title: htmlSpecialCharsDecode
list.description: Decodes a string containing HTML special characters to their corresponding characters.

list.title: isValidFileType
list.description: Check if the file type is valid based on a list of allowed file types.

list.title: isValidUrl
list.description:
The function `isValidUrl` checks if a given string is a valid URL starting with either "http://" or
"https://".

list.title: js/4xx.js
list.description: 4xx error handling script

list.title: js/administration.js
list.description: Administration page script

list.title: js/classes.js
list.description: Utility file for classes.

list.title: js/events.js
list.description: Events handling script file

list.title: js/explorer.js
list.description: Explorer page script

list.title: js/login.js
list.description: Login page script

list.title: js/main.js
list.description: Main file for the desktop page

list.title: js/setup.js
list.description: Utility setup file for desktop app

list.title: js/utils.js
list.description: Utility file for a lot of function etc.

list.title: js/viewer.js
list.description: Viewer page script

list.title: localDatabase
list.description: Variable for the indexedDb things

list.title: maximizeApp
list.description: The function `maximizeApp` hooks minimize event listener to controls button

list.title: minimizeApp
list.description: The function `minimizeApp` hooks minimize event listener to controls button

list.title: mouseSelectBox
list.description:
Sets up mouse selection functionality for desktop icons.
This function creates a selection box that allows users to select multiple desktop icons
by clicking and dragging the mouse.

list.title: nodeFromAjax
list.description: Creates a new vNode object from the JSON response obtained from an AJAX call.

list.title: openDb
list.description:
The function `openDb` opens a database and resolves a promise once the operation is successful.
Plus some extra features

list.title: openDbError
list.description:
The function `openDbError` displays an error message when unable to connect to a database within a
specified time limit.

list.title: pageInIframe
list.description: The function `pageInIframe` checks if the current page is being displayed within an iframe.

list.title: positionContextMenu
list.description: The function `positionContextMenu` position contextMenu if user hovers over app icon perfectly

list.title: processUserIdentifier
list.description:
Processes the user identifier by adding it to the local database and updating the UI with user settings.
Sets the user avatar, username, and various CSS variables based on the user settings.
Logs the time taken to process the user identifier.

list.title: processVNodes
list.description: Asynchronously processes an array of virtual nodes by adding each node to the local database.

list.title: scaleValue
list.description: The `scaleValue` function scales a given value from one range to another range.

list.title: searchEnterHandler
list.description:
Event listener for handling the search functionality in the navbar.
Toggles the visibility of the search menu and focuses on the search input field when opened.

list.title: selectApp
list.description: The function `dragApp` handles app selection

list.title: setCookie
list.description:
The function `setCookie` is used to set a cookie with a specified name, value, and expiry time in
hours.

list.title: setupClock
list.description:
The `setupClock` function creates a clock and a tooltip displaying the current date and time in
cs-CZ format.

list.title: sha256Hash
list.description:
The function `sha256Hash` asynchronously generates a SHA-256 hash for the input text using the Web
Crypto API in JavaScript.

list.title: sizeNumberToString
list.description:
The function `sizeNumberToString` converts a given size number into a formatted string with an
appropriate size prefix.

list.title: sleep
list.description: The function `sleep` returns a promise that resolves after a specified number of milliseconds.

list.title: sort
list.description: Sorts files based on the specified criteria.

list.title: stripPx
list.description:
The function `stripPx` takes an element, a style type, and a default value, and returns the
numerical value of the specified style property without the "px" unit if present, or the default
value if the style property is not set.

list.title: textDeSelect
list.description: The function `textDeSelect` is used to clear any text selection on a webpage.

list.title: textSelect
list.description:
The function `textSelect` is used to programmatically select a range of text within a text input
field.

list.title: timeoutCheck
list.description: Sets up a periodic check to monitor for timeouts.

list.title: timeoutNotification
list.description:
Displays a timeout notification that counts down from 60 seconds and redirects the user
to a session timeout page when the countdown reaches 0.

list.title: timestampToHuman
list.description:
The function `timestampToHuman` converts a timestamp into a human-readable date and time format in
Czech language.

list.title: updateCalendar
list.description: The function `updateCalendar` handles calendar generation

list.title: updateSlider
list.description: Updates the slider element with a linear gradient background based on the current value. CSS/JS trick

list.title: user
list.description: Creates an instance of User.

list.title: userSettings
list.description: Creates an instance of userSettings.

list.title: vData
list.description: Creates an instance of vPermission.

list.title: vNode
list.description: Creates an instance of vNode.

list.title: vPermission
list.description: Creates an instance of vPermission.

list.title: window.onmessage
list.description: Sets up a message event listener on the window object to handle messages received from iframes.

list.title: window.onpageshow
list.description:
Handles the `pageshow` event.
Resets the login animation and clears form inputs if the page was loaded from the cache.
